```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# load packages
# packages for data import
library(REDCapR)
library(ncdfFlow)

# packages for data manipulation
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
library(lubridate)
library(janitor)
library(skimr)

# packages for data export
library(writexl)
```

## Import raw data
### - csv or excel data
<font color="grey"><i> 
raw_data <- read.csv("/data/raw/yourcsvfile.csv") 
</i></font>

### - RDS
<font color="grey"><i>
raw_data <- read_rds("/data/raw/yourrdsfile.rds")
</i></font>

### - REDcap data
<font color="grey"><i>
raw_data <- redcap_read(redcap_uri = yourredcapurl, token = apitoken, raw_or_label = 'label',verbose = FALSE) 
</i></font>

### - flow cytometry data
<font color="grey"><i>
raw_data <- read.ncdfFlowSet("/data/raw/yourfcsfiles") 
</i></font>

### - other types of data

## Check raw data
<font color="grey"><i>
dplyr::glimpse(raw_data)  
ggplot(data = raw_data, aes(x = x_var, y = y_var , color = col_var)) + geom_boxplot()  
</i></font>

```{r}
dplyr::glimpse(iris)  
ggplot(data = iris, aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Sepal.Width , color = Species)) + geom_boxplot() 
```
